【V2.0.0】 Wednesday Rain
Lumins enters a new epoch. 

1、Adjustment module newly added local area, and support 4 layers of separate color mixing.
2、Filter module to add manual smear function.
3、Added 4 free autumn filters
4、Fixed some parts of the problem of entering the editing crash.

【V2.0.1】Wednesday, heavy rain
Everything is important in persistence, so is photography

1、Adapt to iOS15
2、Add manual mask for light and shadow and light spot function
3、Optimized the experience of using manual mask
4、Fixed a lot of memory overflow of editing
5、Fixed a lot of crash problems
